ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL1_BODY: You learn something for completing the first level.
ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL2_BODY: You learn something for completing the second level.
ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL3_BODY: You learn something for completing the third level.
HELP_CHANGE_BARS: Tap joystick up/down or use the up/down keys to change bars.
HELP_LEVER: To fill mug, hold tapper button or press space bar.
HELP_RELEASE: Release tapper when full to fling mug.
HELP_RUN: Move joystick left/right or use left/right keys to run.
HELP_START: Touch the coin to start a game.
